channel.title: Projects on Tan Jing Yu, Denis (陈劲宇)
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Tan Jing Yu, Denis (陈劲宇)

item.title: Customer Support Chatbot
item.description: Created a customer support chat bot for 7 types of intent, trained using artificial neural network in PyTorch Performed text pre-processing using tokenization, stemming and bag-of-words model Click here to find out more!

item.title: NLP with BERT for Sentiment Analysis on IMDb Movie Reviews
item.description: Performed sentiment analysis on IMDb movie reviews using BERT language model and achieved a test accuracy of 94% Click here to find out more!

item.title: Instacart Market Basket Analysis
item.description: Provided analytical methods for Instacart to gain an edge over its competitors Used association rule mining to find out which products were frequently bought together Click here to find out more!

item.title: LTA Mobility Sensing Project for Land Transport Master Plan (LTMP) 2040
item.description: Collected and analyzed 8 types of raw telemetry data for user trajectory prediction Reduced the number of features from 216 to 48 using principal component analysis Developed a LightGBM model using a statistical feature-based approach with ±98% macro-F1 score, optimized for battery usage by eliminating the need for GPS Click here to find out more!

item.title: IBM HR Analytics
item.description: Leveraged external data and machine learning algorithms to accurately assess and shortlist candidates with the relevant skill-sets, experience and psycho-emotional traits Matched employees with relevant job openings to drive operational efficiency and improve accuracy in the matching process Click here to find out more!

item.title: Gender Discrimination
item.description: Utilized data visualization to examine whether gender discrimination influence exists or not on payments and promotion Click here to find out more!

item.title: An Economic Perspective on Predictive Maintenance of Filtration Units
item.description: Performed 5 attack scenarios on the secure water treatment test-bed and collected the sensor data for model development Analyzed the financial impact of Industry 4.0 levers such as IoT enabled sensors on businesses Utilized Monte Carlo simulation to model risk and uncertainty for 4 cost savings categories due to model instability Click here to find out more!

item.title: Decision Making with Programming and Analytics Project
item.description: Analyzed data to help with understanding customer buying patterns, geographical distribution of transactions, stocks item analysis and forecast Provided insights to establish appropriate customer loyalty program, decide upon regional focus, and guide future stock up timing Created a command line user interface which allows user to query data Click here to find out more!

item.title: Designing and Developing Databases - National Fitness Challenge
item.description: Designed and developed a database solution to store information about national fitness challenge Implemented a relational database using MySQL and a non-relational database using MongoDB Performed queries on both databases to demonstrate the trade-offs between both types Click here to find out more!

item.title: Predicting Diabetes
item.description: Developed a logistic regression model and a Classification And Regression Tree (CART) model to predict diabetes outcome Provided insights on the important variables associated with diabetes Click here to find out more!

item.title: Obstacle Game
item.description: Created a simple obstacle game where you have to move past the enemy characters and reach the treasure Click here to find out more!

item.title: Scraping Stack Overflow
item.description: Retrieve questions with most number of votes Retrieve top languages and tag counts Click here to find out more!

item.title: Stock Analysis
item.description: Analyze McDonald versus Microsoft (Correlation coefficient and Spearman Rank Coefficient) Click here to find out more!

item.title: To-Do List
item.description: Simple program to open json file and read the contents Added a few functions to add task input, remove task number input Click here to find out more!
